backend/main.mo: Defines user-related types including moods, genders, relationship intents, avatars, and conversion helpers within the main actor.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module initializing a new directedInteractions map structure for the updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend requirement tied to interaction count display and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files covering routing, UI components, pages, and behavior changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document bootstrapping the frontend app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application setup configuring TanStack Router routes, React Query, theming, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Header with app branding, theme toggle, journal button, and user menu including logout and profile actions.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: Authenticated layout wrapper handling logout redirection and rendering header, bottom nav, journal overlay, and main content.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Bottom navigation bar with icon-first buttons and unread notification badges tied to query data.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Floating action button for composing a new mood entry, shown conditionally based on journal visibility.
frontend/src/components/app/ThemeToggleB: Provides a button that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wraps children with authentication logic, showing a loading spinner or login panel if needed.
Displays the login UI with randomized copy and handles Internet Identity authentication attempts.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Generates and displays a summary of circle energy based on status posts.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Shows circle members with profiles, pulse scores, and removal actions.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Form for entering a share code to request joining a circle with validation and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Displays pending join requests with profile details and actions to accept or decline.
frontend/src/components/circle/SafePeopl: Manages selection of up to two Safe People from eligible candidates with recommendations and toggle handling.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: UI card for viewing, copying, and editing a user's share code with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/common/IconActio: Wrapper around a button that adds an icon and tooltip support.
frontend/src/components/common/Progressi: Collapsible section component with a trigger button and optional default-open behavior.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: Displays a daily mood check-in reminder with actions to check in or dismiss.
frontend/src/components/feed/SilentSigna: Renders a silent signal entry showing author info, mood, timestamp, and styling based on mood.
Lets users send predefined silent signals to Safe People, handling loading and setup checks.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: Popover-based date picker for selecting journal entry dates with future-date disabling.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Shows journal entries for a selected date with creation, deletion, and edit rules based on date.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: Right-side sheet that hosts the journal UI, including rules, date picker, and entries panel.
frontend/src/components/profile/MicroAct: Shows micro‑action suggestions based on mood history, with a fallback when insufficient data and a disclaimer alert.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Analyzes mood trends over a selected timeframe and displays insights, top moods, concern levels, and micro‑actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Provides UI for selecting or uploading a profile avatar with validation, previews, and callback updates.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Gates app content by loading user profile, handling errors, and triggering profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Multi‑step onboarding form collecting profile details and saving them after validation.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundEffec: Watches notifications, feed, join requests, and circle members to play sounds when new activity appears.
frontend/src/components/status/AudienceS: UI component for choosing audience visibility and optionally selecting specific circle members, excluding the current user.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: Provides predefined and custom context tag selection with validation and tag management UI.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Searchable, categorized mood selector rendering emoji-based mood buttons and grouping results.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Modal prompting users to add a private note with optional micro‑action suggestions based on mood history.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Displays a user's status post with mood styling, author info, timestamps, and private indicators.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Defines predefined context tags, soft limits, and max custom tag length.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Contains short core messaging phrases outlining the app's promise and boundaries.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Provides rotating login screen phrases and a helper to pick random ones.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Defines all mood options with labels, emojis, and categories for mood selection components.
frontend/src/constants/sounds.ts: Exports paths for UI sound assets and a type for sound cue keys.
frontend/src/constants/systemAvatars.ts: Defines a fixed list of system avatar IDs and paths and provides a helper to look up an avatar path by ID.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: Provides React context to track and toggle visibility of a floating journal component.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: Manages open state and reset behavior for a journal overlay, exposing open and close controls via context.
frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx: Implements global sound settings, audio unlocking, and playback functions for notification-related sound cues.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to add error reporting and refetch capabilities for actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity login, state management, and persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting journal entries through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Builds filtered and sorted mood history from the user’s feed posts within a given timeframe.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Supplies profile, feed, avatar, and various backend data queries and mutations using the actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: A thin wrapper exposing the sound context hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes, mood colors, and safe-area padding utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Renders the main Circle page with energy card, member lists, join/request panels, and tab-based navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CirclesImInPage.tsx: Displays circles the user is part of, handling loading, error states, and listing owners with avatars.
frontend/src/pages/ClosestConnectionsPag: Shows ranked closest connections with avatars and explanations, including loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Provides a full UI for composing a status with mood, text, audience selection, and context tags.
frontend/src/pages/DailyCheckInPage.tsx: Implements the daily check‑in flow with mood selection, audience controls, guard checks, and status posting.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the main feed with status updates, silent signals, reminders, and refresh capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/HomeRoutePage.tsx: Routes users to public home, feed, or loading state based on authentication and profile readiness.
frontend/src/pages/InviteCodeAuthStepPag: Handles invite-code–based onboarding, login flow, and joining a circle using a stored invite code.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows unread and read notifications with support for marking items or all as read and navigating to related statuses.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Manages user profile viewing and editing, including avatar selection, preferences, and pulse score display.
frontend/src/pages/PublicHomePage.tsx: Public landing page that explains the app and lets users enter an invite code or start account creation.
frontend/src/pages/StartAuthPage.tsx: Authentication entry page allowing users to log in or create an account and routing them after login.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single status by ID with loading, error, and permission handling, and links back to the feed.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Provides utilities to calculate age, format dates for input, and parse input dates into bigint timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/audience.ts: Builds a status post audience list ensuring the author is always included and removes duplicates using Principals.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Analyzes recent posts to categorize circle vibe, generate seeded summaries, and filter out banned terms.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Normalizes and validates custom context tags, enforcing length limits and preventing duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInEntry.ts: Implements a sessionStorage flag to enter daily check-in mode once and consume it on use.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCodeSession.ts: Manages normalized invite codes in sessionStorage, supporting store, retrieve, and clear operations.
frontend/src/utils/microActions.ts: Generates micro‑action suggestions based on recent mood patterns and context tags using a conservative rule engine.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Computes mood distributions, trends, concern levels, and guidance with a built‑in disclaimer.
frontend/src/utils/moodColors.ts: Maps mood categories to Tailwind color and gradient classes for consistent UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Handles once‑per‑day mood reminder logic using localStorage to track dismissal per local date.
frontend/src/utils/profileAvatar.ts: Utilities to derive avatar image sources, validate avatar uploads, convert files to bytes, and revoke blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a six‑character, unambiguous alphanumeric share code for onboarding.
frontend/src/utils/soundPreferences.ts: Gets and sets a boolean sound‑enabled preference in localStorage with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Helpers for converting between bigint nanosecond timestamps and Date objects, comparing dates, and formatting them.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Functions for reading URL parameters (including hash), persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, shadows, and enabling typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata summarizing current architecture, planned membership model changes, and known issues across frontend and backend.
